title: 49th Jodo Taikai Godan Semi final 0-3
tags: Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi, Raiuchi, Seigan
snippet: Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi, Raiuchi, Seigan    Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.(Click on the kata name to see the gr...
content: Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi, Raiuchi, Seigan    Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.(Click on the kata name to see the grading points)SakanUchi:1) Are you correctly thrusting Shi's Suigetsu?2) After the Tachi is struck and you move backwards, are you doing so with your right, then left and right foot?3) Is your Chudan and Hasso-no-kamae correct?Shi:1) Are you taking an appropriate amount of Maai when you go into Ma Hanmi and move backwards to parry the Kensaki that has been thrust at you?2) When you strike the Tachi is your right foot forwards?3) Aligning your left foot to your right foot, are you carrying out the Hikiotoshi in a large movement after holding the entire Jo in both hands?MonomiUchi:1) Are you cutting Shi's Shomen to a line parallel with the floor?2) Have you correctly adopted Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) How is your Ashi Sabaki (footwork)?2) Are you striking Uchi's wrist after rotating the Jo in a large movement?3) Are you correctly executing Kaeshizuki?KasumiUshi:1) Stepping forwards with your left then right from a Nisoku-ittou-no-maai are you correctly cuttingShomen?2) After having Taiatari performed on you are you correctly moving backwards?Shi:1) When you strike in Gyakuteuchi how is your posture and attack?2) Are you correctly performing Hikiotoshi-no-kamae and Taiatari?TachiotoshiUshi:1) Are you parrying the Jo after correctly moving your body horizontally to the left?2) Are you cutting Shi's neck after rotating the Tachi above your head in a large movement?3) Are you moving backwards correctly after having had Kuritsuke performed on you?Shi:1) After moving your body are you correctly carrying out Gyakuteuchi?2) Are you in a correct posture for Kuritsuke?RaiuchiUshi:1) Are you correctly cutting Shi's upper arm?2) After taking a large step backwards with your left foot, are you cutting Shi from their shoulder to their neck?Shi:1) Are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Suigetsu?2) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the left, are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Hibara?SeiganUchi:1) In the correct Maai relative to Shi how is your posture when you grip the Tsuka with your right hand?2) Are you correctly carrying out Katategiri (one handed cut)?Shi:1) Are you correctly entering Uchi's Maai to attack their eyes with the Josaki and then correctly thrusting their Suigetsu?2) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the left, are you correctly thrusting at Uchi's Hibara?3) In response to Uchi's Katategiri, do you move your wrist out of reach and strike their Suigetsu from a correct Hasso posture?

title: 49th Jodo Taikai Yondan Final 2-1
tags: Shamen, Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi, Raiuchi
snippet: Shamen, Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi, Raiuchi    Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.(Click on the kata name to see the gr...
content: Shamen, Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi, Raiuchi    Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.(Click on the kata name to see the grading points)ShamenUchi:1) Are you correctly cutting Shomen to a line parallel to the floor?2) After taking sufficient Maai are you correctly adopting Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the right, are you correctly dividing the Jo into four equal parts, sliding your right hand and striking Uchi's temple with the Josaki?2) Are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Suigetsu?SakanUchi:1) Are you correctly thrusting Shi's Suigetsu?2) After the Tachi is struck and you move backwards, are you doing so with your right, then left and right foot?3) Is your Chudan and Hasso-no-kamae correct?Shi:1) Are you taking an appropriate amount of Maai when you go into Ma Hanmi and move backwards to parry the Kensaki that has been thrust at you?2) When you strike the Tachi is your right foot forwards?3) Aligning your left foot to your right foot, are you carrying out the Hikiotoshi in a large movement after holding the entire Jo in both hands?MonomiUchi:1) Are you cutting Shi's Shomen to a line parallel with the floor?2) Have you correctly adopted Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) How is your Ashi Sabaki (footwork)?2) Are you striking Uchi's wrist after rotating the Jo in a large movement?3) Are you correctly executing Kaeshizuki?KasumiUshi:1) Stepping forwards with your left then right from a Nisoku-ittou-no-maai are you correctly cuttingShomen?2) After having Taiatari performed on you are you correctly moving backwards?Shi:1) When you strike in Gyakuteuchi how is your posture and attack?2) Are you correctly performing Hikiotoshi-no-kamae and Taiatari?TachiotoshiUshi:1) Are you parrying the Jo after correctly moving your body horizontally to the left?2) Are you cutting Shi's neck after rotating the Tachi above your head in a large movement?3) Are you moving backwards correctly after having had Kuritsuke performed on you?Shi:1) After moving your body are you correctly carrying out Gyakuteuchi?2) Are you in a correct posture for Kuritsuke?RaiuchiUshi:1) Are you correctly cutting Shi's upper arm?2) After taking a large step backwards with your left foot, are you cutting Shi from their shoulder to their neck?Shi:1) Are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Suigetsu?2) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the left, are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Hibara?

title: 49th Jodo Taikai Sandan Semi final 0-3
tags: Hissage, Shamen, Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi
snippet: Hissage, Shamen, Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi    Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.(Click on the kata name to see the gr...
content: Hissage, Shamen, Sakan, Monomi, Kasumi, Tachiotoshi    Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.(Click on the kata name to see the grading points)HissageUchi:1) Is the Tachi's Kissaki equally aligned with the Jo in Awase?2) From Hidari-jodan-no-kamae are you correctly cutting the Shomen?3) Have you had Kuritsuke correctly performed on you?Shi:1) Is the Josaki equally aligned with the Tachi in Awase?2) From a correct Kuritsuke are you correctly thrusting the Suigetsu?ShamenUchi:1) Are you correctly cutting Shomen to a line parallel to the floor?2) After taking sufficient Maai are you correctly adopting Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the right, are you correctly dividing the Jo into four equal parts, sliding your right hand and striking Uchi's temple with the Josaki?2) Are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Suigetsu?SakanUchi:1) Are you correctly thrusting Shi's Suigetsu?2) After the Tachi is struck and you move backwards, are you doing so with your right, then left and right foot?3) Is your Chudan and Hasso-no-kamae correct?Shi:1) Are you taking an appropriate amount of Maai when you go into Ma Hanmi and move backwards to parry the Kensaki that has been thrust at you?2) When you strike the Tachi is your right foot forwards?3) Aligning your left foot to your right foot, are you carrying out the Hikiotoshi in a large movement after holding the entire Jo in both hands?MonomiUchi:1) Are you cutting Shi's Shomen to a line parallel with the floor?2) Have you correctly adopted Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) How is your Ashi Sabaki (footwork)?2) Are you striking Uchi's wrist after rotating the Jo in a large movement?3) Are you correctly executing Kaeshizuki?KasumiUshi:1) Stepping forwards with your left then right from a Nisoku-ittou-no-maai are you correctly cuttingShomen?2) After having Taiatari performed on you are you correctly moving backwards?Shi:1) When you strike in Gyakuteuchi how is your posture and attack?2) Are you correctly performing Hikiotoshi-no-kamae and Taiatari?TachiotoshiUshi:1) Are you parrying the Jo after correctly moving your body horizontally to the left?2) Are you cutting Shi's neck after rotating the Tachi above your head in a large movement?3) Are you moving backwards correctly after having had Kuritsuke performed on you?Shi:1) After moving your body are you correctly carrying out Gyakuteuchi?2) Are you in a correct posture for Kuritsuke?

grading points)SuigetsuUchi:1) Are you correctly cutting Shi's Shomen?2) After taking sufficient Maai from Hasso-no-kamae are you correctly adopting the Chu- dan no Kamae?Shi:1) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the right, are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Suigetsu by pulling back your left shoulder?2) Have you correctly adopted Hikiotoshi-no-kamae?3) How is the strength of your Hikiotoshiuchi?HissageUchi:1) Is the Tachi's Kissaki equally aligned with the Jo in Awase?2) From Hidari-jodan-no-kamae are you correctly cutting the Shomen?3) Have you had Kuritsuke correctly performed on you?Shi:1) Is the Josaki equally aligned with the Tachi in Awase?2) From a correct Kuritsuke are you correctly thrusting the Suigetsu?ShamenUchi:1) Are you correctly cutting Shomen to a line parallel to the floor?2) After taking sufficient Maai are you correctly adopting Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the right, are you correctly dividing the Jo into four equal parts, sliding your right hand and striking Uchi's temple with the Josaki?2) Are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Suigetsu?SakanUchi:1) Are you correctly thrusting Shi's Suigetsu?2) After the Tachi is struck and you move backwards, are you doing so with your right, then left and right foot?3) Is your Chudan and Hasso-no-kamae correct?Shi:1) Are you taking an appropriate amount of Maai when you go into Ma Hanmi and move backwards to parry the Kensaki that has been thrust at you?2) When you strike the Tachi is your right foot forwards?3) Aligning your left foot to your right foot, are you carrying out the Hikiotoshi in a large movement after holding the entire Jo in both hands?MonomiUchi:1) Are you cutting Shi's Shomen to a line parallel with the floor?2) Have you correctly adopted Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) How is your Ashi Sabaki (footwork)?2) Are you striking Uchi's wrist after rotating the Jo in a large movement?3) Are you correctly executing Kaeshizuki?KasumiUshi:1) Stepping forwards with your left then right from a Nisoku-ittou-no-maai are you correctly cuttingShomen?2) After having Taiatari performed on you are you correctly moving backwards?Shi:1) When you strike in Gyakuteuchi how is your posture and attack?2) Are you correctly performing Hikiotoshi-no-kamae and Taiatari?

your posture when you grip the Tsuka with your right hand?2) Are you correctly carrying out Katategiri (one handed cut)?Shi:1) Are you correctly entering Uchi's Maai to attack their eyes with the Josaki and then correctly thrusting their Suigetsu?2) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the left, are you correctly thrusting at Uchi's Hibara?3) In response to Uchi's Katategiri, do you move your wrist out of reach and strike their Suigetsu from a correct Hasso posture?

title: 49th Jodo Taikai Shodan Semi final 0-3
tags: Tsukizue, Suigetsu, Hissage, Shamen, Sakan, Monomi
snippet: Tsukizue, Suigetsu, Hissage, Shamen, Sakan, Monomi    Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.(Click on the kata name to see the gra...
content: Tsukizue, Suigetsu, Hissage, Shamen, Sakan, Monomi    Hint: When the video is paused you can move a single frame back or forth by using the < and > keys.(Click on the kata name to see the grading points)TsukizueUchi:1) From a correct Hasso-no-kamae are you entering Shi's Maai and cutting down to a line parallel to the floor?2) Are you adopting the correct Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) How is your posture after you have moved your body diagonally backwards and to the right?2) Are you striking Uchi's left wrist after rotating the Jo diagonally upwards and to the right in a large movement?3) Are you striking Uchi's left wrist with a correct Honteuchi?SuigetsuUchi:1) Are you correctly cutting Shi's Shomen?2) After taking sufficient Maai from Hasso-no-kamae are you correctly adopting the Chu- dan no Kamae?Shi:1) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the right, are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Suigetsu by pulling back your left shoulder?2) Have you correctly adopted Hikiotoshi-no-kamae?3) How is the strength of your Hikiotoshiuchi?HissageUchi:1) Is the Tachi's Kissaki equally aligned with the Jo in Awase?2) From Hidari-jodan-no-kamae are you correctly cutting the Shomen?3) Have you had Kuritsuke correctly performed on you?Shi:1) Is the Josaki equally aligned with the Tachi in Awase?2) From a correct Kuritsuke are you correctly thrusting the Suigetsu?ShamenUchi:1) Are you correctly cutting Shomen to a line parallel to the floor?2) After taking sufficient Maai are you correctly adopting Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) After moving your body diagonally forwards and to the right, are you correctly dividing the Jo into four equal parts, sliding your right hand and striking Uchi's temple with the Josaki?2) Are you correctly thrusting Uchi's Suigetsu?SakanUchi:1) Are you correctly thrusting Shi's Suigetsu?2) After the Tachi is struck and you move backwards, are you doing so with your right, then left and right foot?3) Is your Chudan and Hasso-no-kamae correct?Shi:1) Are you taking an appropriate amount of Maai when you go into Ma Hanmi and move backwards to parry the Kensaki that has been thrust at you?2) When you strike the Tachi is your right foot forwards?3) Aligning your left foot to your right foot, are you carrying out the Hikiotoshi in a large movement after holding the entire Jo in both hands?MonomiUchi:1) Are you cutting Shi's Shomen to a line parallel with the floor?2) Have you correctly adopted Hidari-jodan-no-kamae?Shi:1) How is your Ashi Sabaki (footwork)?2) Are you striking Uchi's wrist after rotating the Jo in a large movement?3) Are you correctly executing Kaeshizuki?
